s:service.name: I18NService
s:service.s:description: Entry points for the i18n service, which is used to fetch localized keys.

s:method.description: Loads localized keys from the server
s:method.name: LoadLocalizedStrings

s:parameter.name: bundleNames
s:parameter.description: The set of bundles to load, if null or empty all bundles will be loaded

s:parameter.name: locale
s:parameter.description: The locale to load the localized strings, if not provided or is empty en-US will be used

s:return.name: localizedStrings
s:return.description: A map of all the localized strings in the given locale where they key is prefixed with the 'bundleName:'
